source_text: Extinguishment of net smelter royalty of 2% associated with the Enmore Gold project.
additional_details: This 2% NSR is associated with the Enmore Gold project. It is a condition precedent for the acquisition that this royalty be extinguished. This implies it is currently payable by the project owner (Panex Resources, which Koonenberry Gold is acquiring) to an unnamed party.
